name: Yakabe
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 50%

desc_short: Boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 50%
提高50%火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值
불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 50% 상승
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 50%, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 50%
desc_long: Boosts fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 50%.
提高50%火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值。
불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅,. 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 50% 상승합니다.
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 50%, alle Verb.
Aumenta la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 50%.
